text: Lohn () was a municipality in Hinterrhein in the canton of Graubünden in Switzerland. It is south of Thusis. On 1 January 2021, the former municipalities of Casti-Wergenstein, Donat, Lohn and Mathon merged to form the new municipality of Muntogna da Schons. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Former municipalities of Graubünden
title: Lohn, Graubünden
